snippets.title: Start JSON Server
snippets.explanation: Starts json server on the specified port, 5555 in this case.

snippets.title: Start NMP Server
snippets.explanation:
npm start is a command used in Node.js projects that typically initiates the execution of a predefined script named "start" specified in the "scripts" section of the project's package.json file.

When you run npm start in the terminal within a Node.js project directory, npm looks for a script named "start" in the scripts section of the package.json file. It then executes the command associated with the "start" script.
